entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. A few showers or drizzle beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers or drizzle. High 7 except 12 inland.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7 except 12 inland. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
